item.description: Strengthening the APAC Cloud Ecosystem for 2026 ğŸŒâ˜ï¸ At Finda Cloud, we believe that strong technology is built on even stronger relationships. As we wrap up a dynamic 2025, our VP - Asia, Victor Leung and Regional Business Development Director, Kelvin Cheung, has been on the ground visiting our key vendor partners across Singapore, Malaysia, and Taiwan. These face-to-face sessions are vital. They allow us to align on roadmaps, understand local market nuances, and ensure our distribution strategy is ready for the next wave of cloud innovation. The feedback from our partners has been clear: the region is ready for growth. We are bringing back exciting new strategies to support our channel network. The foundation is set. item.title: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's A...
item.description: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack
item.content:encoded: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack
